artist.name: Helene Backe Volle
artist.about: I am an artist from Norway ... Much of my art has a focus on humans and nature. I like to incorporate sustainability in my art in every part possible by for example using what I already have. In that way it also challenges me to think outside the box for many of my projects.

projects.name: A New Little Life
projects.description: This is a long and fulfilling description that explains everything about the project in it's fullness!
